features: 😘【52 Inch Long Handle Broom】The upgraded broom and dustpan set features four sections of stainless steel poles in lengths from 25 inches to 52 inches. You can freely combine them according to your height, suitable for children, adults and the elderly, no more worry about too long or too short, say goodbye to bending over starting with this broom and dustpan!

😘【Convenient Storage & Save Space】The long handle broom and dustpan set's latch design allows you to hang the broom and dustpan set together on the wall or place them in a crevice in your furniture. It is powerful and space saving.
😘【Self-Cleaning Dustpan Teeth】Built-in scraper or comb teeth make it easy to clean tangled debris and bristles from your broom without using your hands. Makes cleaning easy and enjoyable.

😘【Upgraded Dustpan for Home Cleaning 】The upright dust pan locks in the open position to easily dispose of trash without spillage or difficult cleanup. The front section of the dustpan has been upgraded to sit flush with the floor without the need for a rubber lip, allowing all trash and debris to easily enter the upright dustpan.

😘【Warming Tips】 If you have any questions about the product, please tell us immediately, we will do our best to solve the problem and make you satisfied. Please believe that your satisfaction is the highest purpose of our service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this to replace one where the stand broke off the dustpan. This is a nice set, the broom and dustpan stay locked together and most importantly, they both stay upright.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this broom and dustpan. Wish the broom head was wider. Works great though. Love the extra long handles

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Just right for my deck and garage cleanup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars no more bending over to hold dust pan!!!!!!!
reviews.reviewText: one of the rods wouldn't stay in and i had to hit it on the floor to hopefully make it stay in>

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the comb on the dustpan!
reviews.reviewText: This broom was very easy to assemble. I have a lot of hair and shed a lot and so I really wanted to have a broom that had a dustpan with teeth so that I can scrape the hair off of the broom. I've always had so much trouble with my hair sticking to the broom and hated having to remove it with my hands. The dustpan has completely eliminated my task of having to touch the broom. The broom itself was just okay, the bristles weren't very thick or strong but it works pretty decent and overall i'm very happy with it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Quick Cleanup of Small Dry Messes
reviews.reviewText: This broom and dustpan set assembles easily. When not in use, the broom bristles rest inside of the dustpan, with the two components clipped together for easy storage. This set fits easily into a broom closet, or it can even be hung up, thanks to loops at the end of each handle.When you need it, it's easy to quickly locate both your broom and dustpan, since the two store together. No more searching around for the dustpan! The handles of each are long enough to be comfortable for most any sized user. I especially enjoy how the dustpan stands at the ready. Just sweep the mess into it, no need to bend over or stoop to hold the dustpan! It even has a yellow "comb" attached that serves to clean the broom's bristles.It's obvious to me that a lot of thought went into the design of this set. Sure, this broom and dustpan set won't replace a vacuum and a mop, however, it's just the thing for quick cleanups of dry messes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice but flimsy
reviews.reviewText: This broom is pretty nice but the brushes are not super stiff so they can fray easy. They also can miss some dirt or push out easy. I like that the dust pan has the bristles to clean off the lint though and that you can store the broom inside of it when you're done. Overall decent and gets the job done.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Saves my back
reviews.reviewText: The long handle on this dustpan is truly convenient. It means that I do not have to bend down all the way to the floor in order to sweep up a trash pile. They’re sturdy yet lightweight and this is a notch on top of the dustpan that keeps the handle upright but it can be moved so that the handle moves freely. The dust pan has a holder on it so that the broom can be attached and they can be stored together.
